messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Where can I sell books online?
messages.msgSnippet: A woman I know has had success purchasing materials through HomeSchool-Curriculum.com. http://www.homeschool-curriculum.com/  I have not used it yet myself.
messages.messageBody:
A woman I know has had success purchasing materials through
HomeSchool-Curriculum.com.
http://www.homeschool-curriculum.com/ I have not used it yet myself.

Olivia




At 09:57 AM 3/7/01, you wrote:
> Date: Tue, 6 Mar 2001 06:33:04 -0600
> From: "Russ Anderson" <anderclan@...>
>Subject: Where can I sell books on-line?
>
>I have lots of curriculum type stuff that I would like to un-load (before
>our move)..Any suggestions for the best on-line spot to list things? I have
>already sold most of my old Sonlight stuff on their buy/sell board with
>great success.. but not sure what to do with the rest?
>Thanks,
>Julie in MO
